cards.rules_text:
Whales and Otters you control get +1/+1 and have haste.
Combo — Create Mr Dolphin, a legendary 1/2 blue Whale creature token with “Whenever this creature attacks, another target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn.” [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]

First strike
[i]Tatami Gaeshi — [/i]Whenever Baiken attacks[i], [/i]create a 0/1 colorless Wall artifact creature token with defender and “Whenever this creature is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.”

Each creature card in your hand has dash. Their dash cost is equal to their mana cost reduced by {2}.
Dash {1}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]

Ward— Pay 3 life.
When Queen Dizzy enters, you become the monarch.
[i]Necro and Undine[/i] — Whenever an opponent becomes the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on Queen Dizzy and that opponent loses 2 life.

[i][i]Enrage[/i] — [/i]Whenever Potemkin is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on him. [i](He must survive the damage to get the counter.)[/i]
Combo — You may pay {G}. When you do, Potemkin fights another target creature. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]

Changeling [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
Double has all activated abilities of creatures you control that don't have the same name as this creature.
{1}{W}: Untap Double. Activate only once each turn.

Combo — Create a 1/1 colorless Minion artifact creature token. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]
[i]Command — [/i]{1}{R}{W}: Creature tokens you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Skulk [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Combo — Surveil 1. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]

Whenever Faust enters or attacks, create a 1/1 colorless Minion creature token
[i]What Could This Be? — [/i]Tokens you control have all activated abilities of other tokens you control.

Mist Finer deals 3 damage to target creature.
Choose your Fighter! [i](Choose a creature you control to become your chosen fighter. Your fighter gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.)[/i]

Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of it, except it's not legendary. For each Aura and Equipment attached to this creature, create a token that's a copy of it attached to that token. Sacrifice all tokens created this way at the beginning of the next end step.
Tag-in {1}{R}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for {1}{R}{W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put its counters on this and attach any number of Equipment that was attached to that creature to this.)[/i]

Combo — Tap or untap target creature. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]
Whenever Millia becomes tapped, you draw a card and gain 1 life.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Choose your Fighter! [i](Choose a creature you control to become your chosen fighter. Your fighter gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.)[/i]

Flying
[i]Viltrum Blood — [/i]Whenever Invincible is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on him. [i](He must survive the damage to get the counters.)[/i]
Tag-in {2}{G}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for {2}{G}{W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put its counters on this and attach any number of Equipment that was attached to that creature to this.)[/i]

Flying
Combo — Pet Shop connives. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn. To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]

Choose your Fighter! [i](Choose a creature you control to become your chosen fighter. Your fighter gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is your fighter's power.

Choose your Fighter! [i](Choose a creature you control to become your chosen fighter. Your fighter gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.)[/i]
Target creature you control gains flying and double strike until end of turn. If it's your fighter, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Combo — You get {E}. [i]({E} is a energy counter. This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]
{3}, {T}: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast that card by paying an amount of {E} equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

Take an extra turn after this one. Skip the main phases of that turn.
Choose your Fighter! [i](Choose a creature you control to become your chosen fighter. Your fighter gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.)[/i]
Exile Stop Time.

Combo — You may have Kirby become a copy of another target creature, except it has this ability. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]

Deathtouch
[i]Fuhajin[/i] — Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} [i](Two energy counters)[/i].
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {E}. If you do, that spell gains deathtouch.
[i]Tryambaka — [/i]When Venom enters, gain control of target creature for as long as you control Venom. That creature becomes an artifact and loses all other card types as long as you control it.

Each creature card in your hand that's one or more colors has Tag-in {1}{W}{U} [i](You may cast that spell for {1}{W}{U} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put its counters on this and attach any number of Equipment that was attached to the tagged out creature to this.)[/i]

Combo — Create a 2/2 green Bear creature token. [i](This creature combos whenever it deals combat damage to a player and whenever you cast your second spell each turn.)[/i]
[i]Loop the Loop — [/i]Whenever an artifact you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. If this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn, that creature deals damage equal to its power to target opponent.

[i]Bloodsucking Universe — [/i]Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls dies, you create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a token, each opponent loses 1 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may collect evidence 3. If you do, investigate. [i](To collect evidence 3, exile cards with total mana value 3 or greater from your graveyard. To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Indestructible
[i]Trigger Happy — [/i]When Deadpool enters, he deals 1 damage to each creature.
Whenever Deadpool is dealt damage, he deals that much damage to target opponent.
